title: Doukyonin no Tenohira de
description:
The dorm where high school boys live
Mikazuchi dormitory...

There's no way love wouldn't bloom in this room with just the two of them!?
Shisui Sougo was forced to live in the dorms in order to change his bad ways. His roommate, Furube, is a perverted problem student who offers paid services in the room!
Even though he was planning to drive him out, he's overtaken by the devilish seductiveness hiding behind those glasses...!?
Aside from the title story, there's also the younger normie and an unsociable guy included.
The love story of dorm students who you can't bring yourself to hate in spite of their peculiarities. <3
Included is a newly created sequel extra. <3
